thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 10 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Limited partnership adds 1.8 pct stake in Hangzhou Liaison Interactive Information Technology

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Limited partnership adds 1.8 pct stake in Hangzhou Liaison Interactive Information Technology

organizations.name: hangzhou liaison interactive information technology co ltd

text:
Jan 11(Reuters) - Hangzhou Liaison Interactive Information Technology Co Ltd
* Says a Shenzhen-based limited partnership adds 1.8 percent stake (38.8 million shares) in the co, during the period from Nov. 20, 2017 to Jan. 9
* Says the limited partnership is holding 5 percent stake (108.9 million shares) in the co
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/7fB2YU
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
